params._numWords: Number of random words to request
params._requestConfirmations: Number of confirmations for VRF request
params.keyHash: VRF key hash for the network

returns._0: Array of past bets (newest to oldest)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

canStartNewGame(address).notice: Check if player can start new game

flipCoin(uint8,uint256).notice: Place a bet on a coin flip (heads or tails)

forceStopGame(address).notice: Force stop a game and refund the player

getPlayerForRequest(uint256).notice: Get player for a specific VRF request

hasPendingRequest(address).notice: Check if player has pending game

recoverOwnStuckGame().notice: Recover from a stuck game and receive refund
